name: SacRepeat
description:
Made in around 8-10 hours for the Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice with the limitation Failure is Inevitable. 

You play as a squishy square named Bob that creates a platform when it dies.

Controls
  • Move: Arrows/WASD
  • Jump: W/Up Arrow
  • Restart: R
Credit
  • Programmer/Artist/SFX: PepperBoi
  • Music: Abstraction - Three Red Hearts
  • Person who did a tiny bit of playtesting and forced me to give him credit: Rein
Join my Discord: https://discord.gg/8tAvpcSz7x
